CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT( Referral_Source_Business_Type__c) ,"Accounting Firm", "PAY-CPA" ,"Broker", "HRS-Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer", "HRS-Financial Advisor" ,"Broker Dealer Branch", "HRS-Financial Advisor" ,"Financial Services", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Referral_Type__c , "Other"), "PAY-Other", "PAY-Bank") ,"Health Ins Broker", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Referral_Type__c , "Trusted Advisor"), "PEO-Trusted Advisor", "PAY-Insurance") ,"Insurance Broker", "PAY-Insurance" ,"Insurance Carrier", "PAY-Insurance" ,"Law Firm", "PAY-Other" ,"National Account", "PAY-Other" ,"Other", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Referral_Type__c , "MSP Partner"), "MSP-MSP Partner", "PAY-Other") ,"P&C Broker", IF ( ISPICKVAL( Referral_Type__c , "Trusted Advisor"), "PEO-Trusted Advisor", "PAY-Insurance") ,"PEO Broker", "PEO-Trusted Advisor" ,"PAY-Other")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Which Zip Segment Does this match to?
CustomField.label: Zip Segment Key
